title: Pick the Right Parasol
detail_text: <:th_ch0008/>Sorry for the wait, Yoshiko-chan~.... Wait, uwaaah!? Are you okay!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Kukuku.... Don’t fret, little demon. Yohane is fine. But, you see.... for someone who draws power from the moon like me.... this sun is a bit....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Let’s just go in the shade! You’ll boil up wearing all black like this~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>It’s okay, I have a parasol....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Hold on. I think I read an article that says black parasols will collect more heat.... Here it is! Look, Yoshiko-chan. Let’s go look for a parasol that can actually keep you cool!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Wait, let’s stay in the shade for a bit more....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Kukuku! Even the scorching sun is like the light of a firefly to me!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>I’m glad you’re feeling better~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Also, I forgot to say this earlier. It’s Yohane, not Yoshiko!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
